summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2014 FORD FUSION. WHILE DRIVING 50 MPH, THE CONTACT'S VEHICLE DECELERATED ON THE HIGHWAY AND LOST POWER. THE FAILURE RECURRED SEVERAL TIMES. A MESSAGE INDICATING "POWER SERVICES OPERATE" WAS DISPLAYED. THE VEHICLE WAS TOWED TO MAHWAH FORD (55 FRANKLIN TURNPIKE, MAHWAH, NJ 07430, (201) 529-3200) TO BE DIAGNOSED, BUT NO FAILURE WAS FOUND. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 8,050. THE VIN WAS INVALID.
